duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell non-invasive wearable cardiac defibrillator system and other ZOLL products to Health Care Professionals in hospital and out-of-hospital settings.
Provide relevant clinical data, reporting, and technical information to support the utilization of ZOLL Cardiac Diagnostic products.
Achieve assigned sales objectives and drive consistent utilization of products.
Educate healthcare professionals and staff about ordering and billing requirements for the WCD.
Maintain a database of accounts, prepare and submit reports.
Attend medical education programs, exhibits, and conventions to become a company expert and resource on ZOLL products and relevant industry trends.
Maintain a collaborative and professional working relationship with all business partners and represent ZOLL in a professional and ethical manner.
Analyze and report on trends within the territory and provide relevant information and documentation for billing claims.
Maintain credentialing/access to all assigned accounts at all times.
Perform other duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from a four-year college or university, or 5 years of successful sales experience in healthcare sales.
